name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-myonedrive
title: My OneDrive
shortDescription: Displays currently logged in user's OneDrive's file
longDescription: This is a sample web part that displays currently logged in user's OneDrive's file
This web part can be useful on the Intranet home page which can be added as My OneDrive files for quick reference of user's OneDrive files.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
